data.text: so many hidden fees despite my account meets criteria. FED should close this pos bank down. I'm closing my account after wasting years with this pos bank. It is really hard to find your credit card history transaction and such. I hate this app and bank. So many clicks to see all your "deposits" in an account. Need to move the "filter" option to each account tab once selected for easy access. Unable to log one the first time, always take 2-3 times to log on.
data.replyText: We're sorry to hear that and would like to try and help. Please email us with details (phone number, link to this public comment and your reviewer name) at appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com. Do not share anything private when emailing us, such as account numbers. -Juju

data.text: I like to pay down my CC statement balance a couple chunks at a time, to keep my balance low and not impact my credit score. I really don't like how this app doesn't show the remaining statement balance, they just show the last statement balance. Makes it more complicated to figure out what the remaining statement balance is. The Amex app makes this super easy. It's a simple formula, please just add it to the app as a visual aid and a selectable payment option.
data.replyText: We'd like a chance to address your concern. Please email us the details (with your phone number, link to this public comment, and your reviewer name) at appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com. Do not share account numbers. -Suzette

data.text: Horrible. Used to work fine for years yet lately for months now, wow, took many attempts to finally got in, always showed all kind of error message, recently said something like lets verify you in different way, really bad. I try to avoid using the app but I have to when depositing checks and it is sp frustrated. It is a big bank so we would expect good technologies but not so much at all.
data.replyText: We're sorry to hear that and would like to try and help. Please email us with details (phone number, link to this public comment and your reviewer name) at appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com. Do not share anything private when emailing us, such as account numbers. -Ian

data.text: For the last five or six months this app has become extremely difficult with the login process. EVERYTIME I log on it does the same thing. I go through the ENTIRE logon process only for it to make me start all over once I reach the six digit code that is texts my phone. Today it took me six tries before I could get to the home menu. Extremely frustrating to have to go through this EACH damn time. Fix it!
data.replyText: This is not the kind of banking app experience we want for you, Jesse. Please allow us to look into this issue. Email us with the details of your concern (phone number, link to this public comment, and your reviewer name) at appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com. -Choi

data.text: Now, it's October and the latest "features" introduced include not being able to transfer funds between accounts, view notifications, or pay bills. Last month, the new feature was an inability to take a photo of a check when using the online deposit feature. Wow! Reverse improvements. Here's an idea: howabout working harder on functionality. Maybe?
data.replyText: We're sorry to hear that and would like to try and help. Please email us with details (phone number, link to this public comment and your reviewer name) at appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com. Do not share anything private when emailing us, such as account numbers. -Hirro

data.text: Surprisingly, not a bad app. It's responsive, it supports biometric authentication, and cashing checks with a picture is pretty neat, in my opinion. The user interface isn't perfect, but there's no ads and only a few popup windows for TOS updates. It meets my needs as a user incredibly well - though, I don't use it for too much, so maybe the more advanced features might be buggy, I'm not sure. Still, impressive for a banking app.

It's already been several days and it still does not allow the changing of the amount and date to my bill payment!!! Does not allow good communication in the app via texts! Repeats words several times when trying to text, using the microphone!! Then if you enter anything else in text after waiting for a response, it begins the waiting process all over again!!!!!!! Sucks!
data.replyText: Hi, Adam. We're sorry for any issues you encountered with this feature. If you'd like us to look into your concern, please email us with details (phone number, link to this comment and your reviewer name) at appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com. For security reasons, don't mention any account numbers. Thanks. -Nina

data.text: It's a very glitchy app, unfortunately. Since the last update, many of the features also disappeared and just throw a "sorry" type of message - including mobile deposit and transfers. It's a shame, too. It used to be a more or less stable app, with only a few grievances. I figured they'd handle the newest round of issues swiftly, but it's been over a month and still no remedy. Most banking has to be done via a website, which is absolutely counterproductive.
data.replyText: Hi, Kristin. Please try deleting the Wells Fargo Mobile® app, then go to the app management section of your device, and then Clear Data and Cache if the option is available. After doing that, try downloading the app again. If you are still having problems, send an email with details to appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com. -Alfredo

data.text: I accidentally set up a direct payment to my account for 3 days back to back in the mobile app. There was no option to edit or delete the pending payment. I called customer service to see if they could delete the pending payments but they basically told me there was nothing they could do. They suggested I contact my bank to place a stop payment on the transactions, which will cost me money so it's either that or wait until the payments are posted and dispute the charges. $700!!!!
data.replyText: This sounds like something a banker may need to review regarding your account. Please give them a call at 1-800-869-3557 so they can authenticate you and look into this. -Hirro

data.text: The new UI is awful. Why did you change it from being a simple couple of presses for sorting transactions to press button, tap in sorting option, scroll down through laggy and unresponsive list, and tap submit. Seems there is very little in UI talent for apps nowadays, like everyone is being taught the same garbage that makes things more difficult.
data.replyText: We want to ensure your feedback is addressed. Please email us the details (with your phone number, link to this public comment, and your reviewer name) at appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com. Do not share account numbers. -Suzette

data.text: Absolutely locked out for almost 2 years! I finally get it straight a few months ago and before long it demanded that I change my password ! I said no but gave me choice. My first one was too close to one I used before. The second one didn't have a special sign? Third attempt it accepted, but of course wouldn't let my password manager save it! Couldn't even screen shot it!! Of course I have no f'ing clue what it is cause I didn't pick it did I?!?!? I grown damn man! I'll pick my own damn passwo
data.replyText: We're sorry to hear that and would like to try and help. Please email us with details (phone number, link to this public comment and your reviewer name) at appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com. Do not share anything private when emailing us, such as account numbers. -Ian

data.text: Bill pay isn't working correctly for the past month or so, you have to delete and re-enter payment amounts to be able to save & finish and then it still doesnt update the changes unless you go all the way out of the app and back in. I've deleted and reinstalled the app and no difference. This used to be the best app out there! Please fix it.
data.replyText: I'm sorry you're encountering issues with our bill pay feature. Please call 1-800-956-4442 to have this looked into. If you require further support, please email us with the details of your issue (phone number, link to this public comment, and your reviewer name) at appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com. Don't include account numbers. Thank you. -Shaira

data.text: It is difficult to scroll through transactions, pending transactions are no longer clearly separated from cleared transactions, the transfer/pay never works and crashes the system. I tried to give feedback and that crashed the system too. I sent feedback through the online banking and got a standard response telling me to uninstall/re-install. Well, it didn't fix the issues. I hope they listen to all these complaints and fix these issues. They've made banking more difficult.
data.replyText: We constantly strive to provide our customers with a great experience. We will consider your feedback seriously in planning future improvements and share it with our mobile team. -Richard

data.text: Was fine before update. Scrolling through transactions has some bugs - it keeps jumping to the top, jittering, or the search at the top keeps dropping down and obscuring half the screen. Scrolling up also shouldn't bring the search down, it obscures too much. Also, there are too few transactions on the account homepage: an extra tap's needed every time I want to scroll past the last 5 or so transactions, and they're far too spread out for a small mobile screen. I preferred the old compact view.
data.replyText: We're sorry to hear that and would like to try and help. Please email us with details (phone number, link to this public comment and your reviewer name) at appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com. Do not share anything private when emailing us, such as account numbers. -Serge

data.text: I quite like this app because it allows me to plan for my trips because I take one every summer in a new state—so it allows me to use my money in that state. However, I wish it were easier to do this, and, as I'm quite young, I would like to have a feature where I can put away money under different labels to make keeping track of my money for future purposes easier. Also, the app doesn't really show my deposits on it, and it's starting to frustrate me—I'd like something other than texts.
data.replyText: Hi, Isabella. My apologies for the frustration. We do want you to know that we value feedback received and will gladly share this with the Mobile Team. If you need additional help, please call us anytime at 1-800-956-4442 to speak with our mobile banking specialists. -Karla

data.text: The new app is awful!! I have to set my phone font to the smallest font to see the details. Unless I click in each transaction. I really dislike this new format. It I turn my phone sideways you can scroll down the list of transactions but not up (just brings up the search bar). Super frustrating app!! Bring back the older version. I would like to see the entire transaction name without changing the phone font.
data.replyText: We constantly strive to provide our customers with a great experience. We will consider your feedback seriously in planning future improvements and share it with our mobile team. -Richard

data.text: Broken navigation.. The app is not bad but the navigation across menu items is completely broken. sometimes it takes back you properly to previous screen and sometimes directly asks if you want to sign out. They must check bofa app for excellent navigation. if there is one thing that needs to be improved then it has to be navigation. if they fix it then it would drastically improve the user experience compared to the clunky experience today.

The new app stinks! In bill pay, when I click on anything, let's say the very last bill in the list of about 30, it pulls up the very first bill listed- when it's not even close to being on the screen. Unless I search for exactly what I want and it's the only bill listed on the page, it won't pull up my desired bill. This is garbage. Bring back the old app, I had zero issues with the old one. How was this not debugged before it was released. Unimpressed, Wells Fargo, unimpressed.
data.replyText: Thank you for reaching out. We do want you to know that we value the feedback received and will gladly share this with the Mobile Team. If you need any further assistance or have additional feedback, please call 1-800-956-4442. -Ronnie

data.text: Updated review 3/14/22: Just used the new app for the first time and it is the WORST app I have ever used. Scrolling through transactions is not a new tech, and yet they made it impossible. They've regressed technologically. I may change banks it's so bad. I hope they change back soon. Old review: Not the best app, but I can pay bills easily enough on my phone instead of pulling out the old laptop. Best part is the ability to make payments outside of WFB without going to each site separately.
data.replyText: Thank you for reaching out. We do want you to know that we value the feedback received and will gladly share this with the Mobile Team. If you need any further assistance or have additional feedback, please call 1-800-956-4442. -Ronnie

data.text: Ever since you guys did the update recently the app sucks. Don't get me wrong the new look is fine, but every other time I use it I get errors "something happened on our end try again later" like when attempting to view my credit card or account activity. All I have to do is sign out and back in and it's fine. So clearly there is some kind of design flaw or something from your update. The constant "errors" are getting really annoying. Fix it.
data.replyText: Hi there, thanks for providing this feedback. We will be sure to share it with the Mobile team as they do appreciate insight on your mobile experience. Thanks again. -Nicole

data.text: I am with 99.9٪ of recent reviewers who are very unhaopy with app revisions. The new screens are washed out, white background and font choices are difficult to read and extra clicks are required to see relevant transaction info. The previous version gave quick, readable access to important information....one click and I was able to get the job done. PLEASE, PLEASE, PLEASE give us access to the previous version... i access this info multiple times daiIy. Will leave WF if no change.
data.replyText: We're sorry to hear that and would like to try and help. Please email us with details (phone number, link to this public comment and your reviewer name) at appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com. Do not share anything private when emailing us, such as account numbers. -Josh

data.text: What a horrible update. App used to work just fine. Now it looks bad, is hard to use and has so many bugs its laughable its published. Filter buttons do nothing. Search doesnt work. The only part that is more prevalent is the partner offers. I don't want a sales app, I want an app for mobile banking. Guess I will switch back to online banking on the PC until this gets fixed. That or finally make the switch to a different bank.
data.replyText: We're sorry to hear that and would like to try and help. Please email us with details (phone number, link to this public comment and your reviewer name) at appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com. Do not share anything private when emailing us, such as account numbers. -Serge

data.text: This is no longer an app, it is simply a wrapper for their website. Fingerprint login is gone, I now have to scroll horizontally to access the sidebars, the new app looks nothing like the example pictures in this listing. Very very disappointed with the latest update. Planning on rolling back to the previous version. Update: going back to a previous version doesn't matter. It looks like they changed the website and the app no longer wraps it properly.
data.replyText: Please allow us a chance to address your mobile deposit concerns. Please call us at 1-800-956-4442 for technical assistance, or email us with the details of your issue (phone number, link to this public comment, and your reviewer name) at appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com. -Choi

data.text: same issue as other customers problems depositing check retaking the picture seventy times and it works on and off.clearly a lack of quality control! I have no issues depositing checks with Chase Bank. Even though the picture is clear of the check through your photo app, it just doesn't accept it. It tells you to back up,move closer, back up, move closer, to take Pic a million times in a row and it never corrects the issue!!!!!!!!!!????
data.replyText: As we continue to enhance the app's capabilities, we're aware that there are many Android™ devices with unique camera functionality. Many factors can interfere with a user's experience. If you'd like us to research this issue, email us with the details, phone #, link to this comment, & your reviewer name at appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com. -Tiffany

data.text: Terrible App. It makes you repeat steps over and over. Each bill has to be approached singularly from the opening menu so you can't access bills, set up all payments, and hit schedule payments-Plural. You have to do each bill from the opening start menu and go through each and every step with every single bill. It was an easy process when WF introduced it. Go to the app, go down your list, set them up, hit the button and that was it. Done for the month. I HATE IT. Have moved most to another bank

It has many problems and repeatedly screws up things like mobile deposits and randomly signing you out while actively using the app. the support center is lacking, difficult to understand, and is incompetent. I spoke with 2 operators, 1 supervisor, and a tech support, in a call that lasted over an hour, half of which was in waiting cues, to learn that they never had any capability to fix the issue I was having.

Ever since the recent Look Revamp I've been having nothing but problems. It has me do the fingerprint scan twice before logging in, it keeps saying there is an "error on our end" and I have to log off. After several attempts, I make it to my home screen with accounts but as soon as I click on one i get the same error note and asked to log off. Please fix soon, I use this app daily. Thank You.
data.replyText: We'd like to help resolve this issue. To determine what may be occurring with your app, please contact technical support at 1-800-956-4442, so they can look into this. -Josh

data.text: The update is a downgrade in functionality. The biggest gripe I have for daily use is scrolling thru transaction history, the Search/Filter drop down function is TERRIBLE! Everytime I pause to read while scrolling and touch the screen, that stupid Search/Filter pops down forcing the transaction history to push down beyond where I stopped. Worst UI choice ever; it's maddening! Put those buttons on the top bar w/ Back button and notification Bell icon, duh! Deals broke. White screen is too bright.
data.replyText: Apologies for the inconvenience. Get a preview here: https://featuredemos.wf.com/en/home of the rebuilt Wells Fargo Mobile® app and see what easier looks like. If problem persists, please call us at 1-800-956-4442. -Hanj

data.text: This most recent version of the App is a Hugh step backwards. The old app was great. This one often makes you log in multiple times, when you ask to filter ..say you want to look at your checks only, it gives a "we're sorry, this option is unavailable" message. And tells you to try back later, but it never works. It is way harder to see where actual charges were from too. This version is not user friendly and just frustrating. This app makes me consider switching banks it's so irritating.
data.replyText: We'd like to help. To determine what may be occurring with your account, please contact technical support at 1-800-956-4442, so they can look into this. -Angie

data.text: 3/21/22 it sucks to be an uncompensated alpha tester. It's got an option to dispute a charge, but all it says is you have to log in to a desktop or laptop to actually dispute the charge. The current app really has no value. Hold off on the update folks. Fast look is gone or hidden so well it can't be found. Some app choices don't even work, just serve you a blank screen. It's been optimized until it's unusable.

data.text: Over the past months I've experienced nothing but trouble with this app! It crashes and I have to login 4 times before it loads. data.text: The new update is totally different from the old one. I usually use the app to check balances using Fastlook. You say it has been eliminated. Why? Was there a survey out that gathered information to warrant it's discontinuation? Convenience is what I am looking for and not signing on to check balances or text. The Fastlook did the trick. Please accommodate it in with the new updates. Just a tap on the drop down menu to reveal the balances is what I am looking for, not signing on, texting or call

data.text: The app has gone downhill. The new interface has a lot of lag and wasted space. The scrolling stutters and jumps. I want the option to "endless scroll" my transactions. The filter seems buggy. The biometric login has a bug where it pops up twice when the app first loads which causes problems while logging in if you try both or sometimes just the first one. I don't have confidence that all of my transactions display & can't trust that my balance is accurate. Edit: I won't do free ui/ux consults
data.replyText: We're sorry to hear that and would like to try and help. Please email us with details (phone number, link to this public comment and your reviewer name) at appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com. Do not share anything private when emailing us, such as account numbers. -Juju

data.text: With the new update, if you access one of your accounts and attempt to go back to the home page, you are automatically logged out. Impossible to perform multiple actions at a go as you get logged out everytime you try to go back to the home page. Also is the snapshot account option available with this new update? That was an awesome feature that enabled a quick view of account balances without having to sign-in.

data.text: Why?! Why change the look? When you need to take a quick look into your account, like checking, maybe to see if something went through or the amount, you have to click to open each and every one. No more taking a quick glance. Sometimes wifi is not so great so you have to wait for each transaction to open. Way to go making things more difficult with our accounts.
data.replyText: We're sorry to hear that and would like to try and help. Please email us with details (phone number, link to this public comment and your reviewer name) at appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com. Do not share anything private when emailing us, such as account numbers. -Josh

data.text: I have to keep enabling my phone to receive PUSH notifications. Never had to do this in the past. I like getting notifications every time I make a purchase and this hasn't worked for a few weeks now. Nothing has changed on my phone still running Android 8.0. Text alerts for purchases made was much better in the past. I'm actually considering closing out my accounts if this issue doesn't get fixed soon. I like being alerted of any activity on my phone, very useful when it works. Thanks!   To Follow up, Uninstalled then reinstalled App so far no issues ! Notification alerts are working again :)

Sometimes it open to blank screen, other times to account summary but when you click on account get an error, other times get an error just signing on. Used to be great. Since the app was updated it has been painful. I neglect my accounts. I have also tried Uninstalling and reinstalling several time over the past few months. This doesn't help.

Then you go to your account and your transactions are showing but they're cut off half way so you have to click on them to see what they actually are and when you back out of it takes you back to the top. data.text: It's a pretty good app usually, but still has some links to iron out, door example, I was trying to send $ to someone for the 1st time, and they needed to text me a verification code. That's fine, but when you switch apps, (without closing anything), the app just returns to the main menu. I tried again and it asked for a code again and sent a new verification code, which you'd have to switch to your messages to see, resetting the app again... I'd also also like to eventually see a little reporting capability one day.

UPDATE: 2 stars was too many. Abysmal. Click to see detail of transaction and then return to list and you will be far from where you were.///// First, the app is visually twitchy; scroll to review transactions & list jumps back a few lines with each touch. It's jarring, forcing me to find anew the last item I was looking at. 2nd, to search for a particular transaction, I must now navigate past the overview page by clicking "see all transactions" at the bottom of the recent transactions. Idiotic.

data.text: Very bad experience. The app elements does not work as intended. lot of pages have truncated content that hides behind some button or other element or behind the screen (just not scrollable). Functionality is also bad. data.text: Right before you click the final send button, there is a pop up warning "Be totally sure you want to send this. Cancel. Send" The only choices are "cancel" and"send". They need to add a review option at this point. If you click send it sends. Final answer. If you click cancel, instead of giving you a second chance to review, it sends you all the way back to the opening menu, undoing everything you just did. Suggestion. If you're asking someone to be sure, you need to allow them to review.
data.replyText: Hi, Carmen. We would like to try and help. Please email us with details (phone number, link to this public comment and your reviewer name) at appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com. Do not share anything private when emailing us, such as account numbers. Thank you. -Ludwicke

data.text: I'll be fair, the app itself is pretty decent. Easy navigation for the most part, and any limitations are shared by the website, so they may be forced. There is an issue with rubber banding when scrolling while looking at transactions. Fingerprint login is nice. The notifications are probably super helpful, but you have to know to enable them. They may mention them in one of the sales pitch screens, but since those are almost always not even slightly relevant to my needs, I ignore them entirely.
data.replyText: Hi there, thanks for providing this feedback. We will be sure to share it with the Mobile team as they do appreciate insight on your mobile experience. Visit https://featuredemos.wf.com/en/home for help with app navigation. -Suzette

data.text: The new UI is frustrating when trying to scroll while viewing all transactions on an account. Nearly half the screen is used for the balance/search/filter bar. When trying to scroll, that portion of the screen jumps out of view shifting the transaction list. So the scrolling motion pulls back into view the balance/search/filter bar and the transactions you were just viewing. I found a workaround by leaving and returning to the app, then scrolling up pushed the bar out of view properly.
data.replyText: Hi, we constantly strive to provide our customers with a great experience. We will consider your feedback seriously in planning future improvements. If you need any further assistance or have additional feedback, please contact us at 1-800-956-4442. -Roger

data.text: Good for viewing finances but I would like to go deeper with my budgeting. In the expense tracker, a lot of my expenses are labeled "other" or *miscellaneous" and this prevents me from easily tracking exact expenditures. I've had to create my own budget spreadsheet instead and rely on my text alerts to maintain my budge. Inside the budget tracker I would like to be able to see exactly which purchases fall under each label instead of just a dollar amount under more information.
data.replyText: Thanks for providing this feedback. We will be sure to share it with the Mobile team as they do appreciate insight on your mobile experience. -Suzette

data.text: Terrible! Fingerprint sensor shows up erratically, you have to manually put it up sometimes. Cannot scroll through the transactions smoothly, jumps all over, is erratic. Font is too large now and I cannot see payee unless I click on each individual transaction, have to go to settings and reduce font for this app only. Big search bar in center screen of transactions not good placement. Prior app much better. Updates on apps are rarely an improvement imo.

data.text: Not user friendly. Filter doesn't work. Tried just showing deposits, and the button wouldn't budge from "All" field. Automatically opens up the search field with an active cursor in it, so it doesn't scroll independently from the phone screen. So, you put your finger on the screen to scroll down, but when you lift your finger to scroll again, the information shifts from what your phone screen is displaying to what the app is allowing you to see with the inclusion of the search field.
data.replyText: Allow us to address these concerns. Please call us at 1-800-956-4442 for technical assistance, or email us with the details of your issue (phone number, link to this public comment, and your reviewer name) at appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com. -Choi

data.text: The updated UI is refreshing at least. But scrolling through the list of transactions glitches (without any filters). It pulls me back to the top and then if I try to scroll quickly it seems to work but scrolling slowly thereafter still causes the list to twitch up and down making it difficult to read any of it. Update: I switched from the WF app to leave this review and went back to WF and scrolling works. Had to put the app in background for a bit and go back for some reason
data.replyText: Hi there, thanks for providing this feedback. We will be sure to share it with the Mobile team as they do appreciate insight on your mobile experience. Thanks again. -Nicole

data.text: Dumbed down now to point of uselessness. Wells Fargo app used to have a complicated user interface but do almost everything you would want to do for online banking. A recent overhaul has simplified the user interface but in turn removed a ton of functionality, reducing this app to a glorified dashboard. Additionally, there are still some bizarre user interface problems including the back button is mapped to log out and attempting to highlight any text will result in bringing up the print dialog.

The newest update has ruined the functionality of this app. It was simple and fast and now I have to turn my phone sideways to see the details of the transactions and it only shows 2 at a time like that because of a giant search bar at the top that I rarely would use. I actually went back to using the browser because it's like the older version of the app. This update is too flashy and not necessary. Makes navigating more difficult.
data.replyText: Thank you for reaching out. We do want you to know that we value the feedback received and will gladly share this with the Mobile Team. If you need any further assistance or have additional feedback, please call 1-800-956-4442. -Ronnie

data.text: The screen is definitely too bright. The old app was fine until updated changes. I understand the need to update in some areas. Also, I think that you shouldn't be able to see your balance as soon as you log in. It hits you right in your face! No privacy if someone was close to you. Maybe, it should be checking savings...then you click to open.
data.replyText: We're sorry to hear that and would like to try and help. Please email us with details (phone number, link to this public comment and your reviewer name) at appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com. Do not share anything private when emailing us, such as account numbers. -Angie

data.text: This most recent update has been incredibly bad. I use fingerprint sign on and it pops up before the app has loaded, then once it loads, it tells me to use my fingerprint again. Then 90% of the time when I'm signed in, an error message immediately appears saying "there was an error on our end. Please sign on and try again later." Or the other 10% where I can view my balance, but if I click anything, that same error message will appear.
data.replyText: We constantly strive to provide our customers with a great experience. We will consider your feedback seriously in planning future improvements and share it with our mobile team. -Richard

data.text: Works well enough. But would be better if fingerprint setup actually worked. I have not bern able to set it up on the last three phones I have had. Will rate higher if this feature ever actually works. Lowered a star because of the reply. We the users are not idiots. I myself am a developer. I know how to check,a box. I have 5 other apps installed where the fingerprint works just fine. I am not the only android user with this issue. It does not work.
data.replyText: You may want to check out your device settings as well as the Biometric Authentication FAQ https://www.wellsfargo.com/help/security-and-fraud/biometric-faqs/. If you still experience issues, please email us appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com. For more help: 1-800-956-4442. -Roger

data.text: The newest updates aren't working. I have to sign on sometimes 3 times before it will allow me to go into a specific account to see transactions. The new labels on the transactions are very generic. You have to drill into a specific transaction to see what it is for. That's a huge disappointment! When you "X" out of the detail, the app brings you back to the top of the transactions. The update is awful and I hate it.
data.replyText: Apologies for the inconvenience. Get a preview here: https://featuredemos.wf.com/en/home of the rebuilt Wells Fargo Mobile® app and see what easier looks like. If problem persists, please call us at 1-800-956-4442. -Hanj

data.text: Most features work well. The phone app behaves better than the desktop app. Some problem with the phone app not finding most of the payees in the list when looking at all payees. Seems like there should be a scroll function or see more entries. When I could not find my payee, I entered a new one, then it told me it already existed. I cancelled the entry returned to the payee list, but still could not find the payee and ended up reentering it again and telling the app to duplicate.
data.replyText: Some features of Bill Pay may look and feel differently on the Wells Fargo Mobile app versus Wells Fargo Online (desktop). Thanks for the feedback as we continue to enhance the mobile experience. If you feel you’re experiencing an error, email us details (phone number, link to this comment and your name) at appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com. -Roger

data.text: The redesign is cluttered. Hard to find links now. Seems they have combined some. Can't view account activity all at once because the spread is too wide for my tablet unless I turn it. Waaay too much stuff on the right margin. Update: seems the clutter is only on my (Samsung s6) tablet. It's in bank product ads like mortgage rates and credit cards. Makes it hard to find other features, and they have combined some on one click so I just use my phone instead. Much simpler layout. Added a star
data.replyText: We're sorry to hear that and would like to try and help. Please email us with details (phone number, link to this public comment and your reviewer name) at appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com. Do not share anything private when emailing us, such as account numbers. You can also reach out to our specialists anytime at 1-800-956-4442. Thanks. -Ludwicke

data.text: Im sorry but compared to other banking apps, this has still been the buggiest and frustrating experience I've ever had for a banking app. It's been this way for years. I know the update improved the looks on it, but it still runs like garbage. Page loading issues, unresponsive buttons, constant need to login and out, resized screens issues. Sorry, just fire your development team or go learn a few things with Chase Mobile Banking and etc.
data.replyText: Sorry to hear about your experience. If you're having access issues, please call us at 1-800-956-4442 for technical assistance. Otherwise, please email us with the details of your issue (phone number, link to this public comment, and your reviewer name) at appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com. -Jules

data.text: I used to use the app daily, with no issues before the update. After this newest iteration, it's taken a big leap backward. I used to be able to easily and effortlessly log my deposits, transactions, transfers, etc. Now I have to open multiple filters and windows to search for the same information, and reload the app because it glitches frequently. Please consider going back to the old application.
data.replyText: Your feedback is important, and we'll surely share this with our Mobile team. Thank you for letting us know about your experience. -Choi

data.text: Update January 2023. Navigation is now fixed. The new-look and layout is better. It's now 8 months later and they still have not fixed the back button issue on Android. The back button should take you to the previous screen not exit the program unless you're on the first screen. Removed one star. Works very well with a few exceptions. The one glaring problem is that the back button does not go back one screen It takes you out of the application. this is not how back button is supposed to work.
data.replyText: Hi there, thanks for providing this feedback. We will be sure to share it with the Mobile team as they do appreciate insight on your mobile experience. Thanks again. -Roger

data.text: Not a good setup. Can no longer view who I purchased from without touching the transaction amount, so no quick overview of purchases. When you rotate the screen to see the entire transaction, you can only scroll one direction. Scrolling back only brings back your balance and the transactions disappear. I understand that there are app/IT/tech employees that need to justify their employment by claiming that changes need to be made, but it was fine the way it was. At least give the users an option.
data.replyText: We're sorry to hear that and would like to try and help. Please email us with details (phone number, link to this public comment and your reviewer name) at appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com. Do not share anything private when emailing us, such as account numbers. -Richard

data.text: Once you log out, it is not easy to close the app without going through several steps. It seems like the app disables the display of the back, clear, and app switching buttons. In the grand scheme if things, this is not a show stopper, but is a bit of an annoyance and inconvenience, we are all aware of how sorry companies are for causing annoyance. On another note, the "new" app looks almost exactly the same as the browser-based website. Why do we need to have a separate app just for WF?
data.replyText: We'll share this feedback with our Mobile team, Dan. Thank you for letting us know what you think. If you need help with the app, please call 1-800-956-4442. -Choi

data.text: They've done a massive update recently: looks beautiful, completely non functional. I now have to fingerprint in twice on different log in screens, anything you click takes you to a screen that says it's not working and logs you out of the app. I literally can't do a single thing in this app. It's been a terrible and unsuccessful rollout but - in true WF fashion - they're barreling forward with something bad instead of rolling back to something that worked and spending more time to get it right.
data.replyText: Please share the details of your app experience by sending us an email at appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com. Do not share account numbers but do include your reviewer name, phone number, and the link to this review. -Suzette

data.text: Horrible redesign Thank you for the quick reply. I appreciated the last app and it's clear tabs. I would like to once again easily navigate between transactions of withdrawal and deposit. Having a search bar is convenient but I don't want to have to do a search for all. When navigating financials I don't feel that the fico score, products available, and discounts are the most important aspect of the app for me. My financial information and having clear ways to locate areas in accounts is.
data.replyText: We're sorry to hear that and would like to try and help. Please email us with details (phone number, link to this public comment and your reviewer name) at appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com. Do not share anything private when emailing us, such as account numbers. -Angie

data.text: I really like the app for most things I need to do. it's quick and easy to pay bills it's quick and easy to inspect my balance. it's simple to make transactions. occasionally some of the navigational metaphors are obscure, however. and doing anything unusual may take a little research. could probably use some work on the search engine to make it quicker faster to answer the question, "how do I execute...?"

The new app constantly freezes and says 'information unavailable'. The revamp itself isn't terrible, even if I don't personally like it, but the way the information is stored causes extra user clicks to obtain the full account picture. This used to be one the best mobile banking apps out there. I assume this was multi release/agile roll out, and there is more to come, but IMO apps that add clicks generally detract from customer experience.
data.replyText: Hi there, thanks for providing this feedback. We will be sure to share it with the Mobile team as they do appreciate insight on your mobile experience. Thanks again. -Nicole

data.text: I use this app only for check deposit in order to save trips to the bank. It stopped working after app update. I then purchased a new phone running OS 9 but found still did not work. I emailed to developer contact for help and the answer was: "The Wells Fargo Mobile app is only supported on Android™ devices running OS 7.0. We are aware that there are many Android™ devices with unique camera functionality and many factors can interfere with a user's experience". I uninstalled it.

Latest update is less user-friendly and has multiple glitches on my android phone. For example, I constantly have to sign in multiple times because I get a message saying, "Error on our side." Also, once I finally found the option to search transactions, the search filter does not work. I would like to search "deposits," but clicking on the choices does nothing. I preferred the previous version and had none of the current problems.
data.replyText: Thank you for providing this feedback. We constantly strive to provide our customers with a great experience. If you need any further assistance or have additional feedback, please contact us at 1-800-956-4442. -Sofia

data.text: think my review got removed, but this app redesign is complete garbage. it takes more taps to get to things, hides away information that used to be in plain sight, and doesn't even work half the time. it adds an extra fingerprint read for no reason, then when you get in the app, it errors out almost instantly. great. thanks for this garbage redesign, wells fargo.
data.replyText: We constantly strive to provide our customers with a great experience. We will consider your feedback seriously in planning future improvements and share it with our mobile team. -Richard

data.text: The redesign is terrible in that it takes MORE clicks to access the information you need. For example, account history. In previous version, after logging in and clicking on my account, it shows the history right away. Now, it takes three clicks to get the same information, which is a 300% DECREASE in productivity. Yes, it's just two additional clicks, but, normally, you redesign to be more efficient or effective, not the other way around. Worse part is that there's no options to customize.
data.replyText: Hello, Vincent. We constantly strive to provide our customers with a great experience. We will consider your feedback seriously in planning future improvements. If you need any further assistance or have additional feedback, please contact us at 1-800-956-4442. -Helen

data.text: I have been using this app for awhile. After the latest update, push notifications got disabled. Had to re-enable them, worked for a day, then next day nothing. Went back in, had to re-enable, same day after day. I like to watch my account and know when a transaction occurs, now I have missed a few notifications because this keeps happening. FIX IT!
data.replyText: We'd like to help. To determine what may be occurring with your account, please contact technical support at 1-800-956-4442 so they can look into this. -Tiffany

data.text: You update is absolute garbage. There's a filter option that pops up and disappears seemingly at random while scrolling. It ends up throwing your account history all over the screen. Makes it near impossible to see everything. The app previously worked great for me. Edit: Trying to get everyone to email is pointless. Everyone is having the same problems. Fix the app instead of trying to manage individuals.
data.replyText: We're sorry this has been your experience. Please email us with more details (phone number, device/operating system, link to this public comment, and your reviewer name) at appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com. Do not share anything private when emailing us, such as account numbers. Please email us, so we can share this with our support team. -Alex

data.text: Became unusable after the latest so much touted "great update". Very slow to start up on my phone. I was done paying my bill in the old version in the time it takes this one to just get me to the main screen with the account list. After that, too many steps to arrive to the "pay bills" page. Isn't this the main purpose of this app, to pay bills quickly? Once on the pay bills page, selecting a payee results in an empty page with the word "Error" on it. Time to go back to paying bills from my PC.
data.replyText: We're sorry for the inconvenience. Please try uninstalling and reinstalling the app. If you need additional help, call us at 1-800-956-4442. Thank you. -Ronnie

data.text: They ruined the app. Old version was pretty good and convenient. Didn't even have to sign in each time you wanted to view your balance. Now it's all gone to hell. Scrolling through transactions and it gets really buggy. Constantly have to input credentials just to take a peek at the balance. UI straight up hot garbage, no matter where you are in the app. Whoever developed this has got to go. This is like the Windows 8 of all the past versions they've released thus far. Just terrible. 0/5
data.replyText: We're sorry to hear that and would like to try and help. Please email us with details (phone number, link to this public comment and your reviewer name) at appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com. Do not share anything private when emailing us, such as account numbers. -Richard

data.text: Used to be amazing, the new 2022 version update seems to have eschewed all meanignful functionality in favor of a 'seamless' experience. So much removed...its nearly reason enough to switch banks which have applications that have not been gutted. Been with wellsfargo for nearly 20 years, I don't at all like that prospect. To clarify a key concerns is all the navigation menus are just.....gone. Screenshots indicate they should be on the botton of the screen, they are not, so any functionality transfer, zelle, deposit are not a thing I can do any longer.
data.replyText: Hi there, thanks for providing this feedback. We will be sure to share it with the Mobile team as they do appreciate insight on your mobile experience. Visit https://featuredemos.wf.com/en/home for help with navigating the new app. -Suzette

data.text: The app stopped working a month or two ago. I have the same issues as everyone else. Login rarely works. When it does, the app gets stuck on a white screen, or kicks me out again. I emailed support, they told me to call the 800 number (like all the other reviewers here). I called that but gave up after 2.5 minutes of their automated phone maze. "Press 1 for.... press 2 for.... sorry, I didn't quite catch that..." I'm just going to stick with the website for now. Hopefully they fix the app eventually.

This software is ok, but could use some quality control, especially in the function that allows use of fingerprint. It keeps telling to to sign out and to turn on that capability on my phone (hassle when you're busy). I've had it setup for years, but Wells software cannot detect that fact, so I have to search for my password. I've been trying to get the software to cooperate for years. I give up. I'll only use it when I've a half hour to spare. Also wonder why it needs a darker background.
data.replyText: Hi there, thanks for providing this feedback. We wanted to share that some functionalities and features are available only on the desktop experience at this time. We will be sure to share this feedback with the Mobile team. -Hanj

data.text: Used to function perfectly but for the last couple months the mobile deposit feature very rarely works. It says that the check amount doesn't match the picture and to try taking the picture again but it never resolves the error. Changing the background, light source, angle, distance and uninstall/reinstall doesn't make a difference. I've wasted so much time on this nonsense. 12/24 Update: The app is working better now and I've been able to deposit more reliably.
data.replyText: We'd like to help. To determine what may be occurring with your account, please contact technical support at 1-800-956-4442, so they can look into this. -Angie

data.text: Does what it's supposed to do, it's quick, it's convenient, but I can't give it 5 stars due to the lack of Face Unlock option. I have a film screen protector on my phone that's often rough to register my finger print, so having to put in my password after too many failed attempts is quite annoying. Would be so much more convenient if face unlock or pin for that matter, was added as an option to access your account.
data.replyText: Hi there, thanks for providing this feedback. We will be sure to share it with the Mobile team as they do appreciate insight on your mobile experience. Thanks again. -Josh

data.text: new platform is absolutely horrible... old version, info efficiently and effectively laid out. Professional appearance. New version (phone) looks like it was designed by an amateur, or a child. Totally lost its professional appearance. More importantly, now you have to traverse across multiple pages to get the same info as before. Not to mention it is really buggy. Cant even get to bill pay from phone anymore.
data.replyText: Hi, we constantly strive to provide our customers with a great experience. We will be sure to share your feedback with the Mobile team as they do appreciate the insight. Thank you. -Irvin

data.text: Update: Love that the fingerprint sensor is an option now. But this latest update/new interface is terrible. Not easier to read, not easier to access/"find" transactions, and I always get the message, "We're sorry. This service is temporarily unavailable." Save yourself the time and just use the desktop site. App needs to be updated and include a fingerprint sensor option for easier access
data.replyText: We constantly strive to provide our customers with a great experience. We will consider your feedback seriously in planning future improvements and share it with our mobile team. -Richard

data.text: The overall use of the app is great. Once you become familiar with navigation, it's easy to maneuver through. I only have one concern....... the app isn't set up to show you pending deposits. It shows posted transactions, withdrawals and deposits, but it's not set up to show any pending transactions. For the everyday workers, that may be an issue as far as managing money flow between the account and a bill that is in lieu of payment.
data.replyText: Hi there, thanks for providing this feedback. We will be sure to share it with the Mobile team as they do appreciate insight on your mobile experience. -Jules

data.text: App is always stuck on a blank screen when aunthenticating with biometric, it requires pressing the device's back button to get out of. Then it requires aunthenticating again, twice, before finalling logging in. Using basic features is a hassle, they also get stuck on a blank screen, other times it shows "unavailable". The app requires constant bug fixes which should be the main focus not adding more features that will not work. It's a far cry from the former build.
data.replyText: We'd like to help. To determine what may be occurring with your account, please contact technical support at 1-800-956-4442 so they can look into this. -Hirro

data.text: Every time I think I've figured out the intricacies of navigating the site to find what I want or how to get something to work, you go and CHANGE it in the name of "progress" ! Very disconcerting ! Needs simplification (especially BillPay). Less is more. However, when I can get it to work correctly, it's a wonderful conveniance, especially being able to deposit a check with my smartphone. Kudos!
data.replyText: Hi, Jacqueline. Thanks for reaching out to us. data.text: Long-time user. Overall, the app is good. However, it is difficult to put into (polite) words how frustrating it is to scroll through my transaction only to end up back at the same transactions. The screen jerks down as I scroll, and my scrolling makes no progress. It doesn't happen all the time, but it makes me want to uninstall the app when it happens. I also don't think the ballance and search bar should take up 1/3 of the screen in the transactions view. Give me a button to search.
data.replyText: Hi, we constantly strive to provide our customers with a great experience. We will consider your feedback seriously in planning future improvements. If you need any further assistance or have additional feedback, please contact us at 1-800-956-4442. -Roger

data.text: Newest update crashes constantly. I cross my fingers and hope that it doesn't crash before I even click the box to show the balances of all my accounts separately. I get a message that it was an error "on their part" and have to sign out and in again (fingerprint twice to even login). Forget trying to stay on there long enough to do any research on your account. Search function was hard to find and I don't see where you can change view to just deposits, etc. Nearly unusable!

data.text: The update to this app is horrible! I do not like the layout in general but the way transactions show now is extremely un-user friendly almost like they tried to see how hard they could make it to see what is going on in your accounts. In general it looks as if it doesn't fit a mobile screen(no it's not my settings) I also miss being able to see my available balance without having to sign all the way in. Wish I could un-update!

data.text: Easy to use and they've made the design and experience better over the years. One thing I've found is that the app doesn't shrink the screen to fit all of the content when the keyboard appears, so I have to remember to close it to continue in transfers or entering information, etc. It's pretty annoying as sometimes it looks like there's no way to continue, and I restart the flow sometimes before I remember I have to close the keyboard to see the rest of the screen.
data.replyText: We're sorry to hear that and would like to try and help. Please email us with details (phone number, link to this public comment and your reviewer name) at appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com. Do not share anything private when emailing us, such as account numbers. Thank you. -Isi

data.text: Even though I have the 2 factor authentication setting set to "off", the app never actually lets me log in without sending a text message to authenticate me. And to top it off, it doesn't allow me paste the 6-digit code that I had just received, which I am then forced to type in. I've used plenty of other banking apps from competitors and have never had this terrible of an experience. I will literally put off using this app, instead choosing to wait until I can access the website on my laptop.
data.replyText: We're sorry to hear that and would like to try and help. Please email us with details (phone number, link to this public comment and your reviewer name) at appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com. Do not share anything private when emailing us, such as account numbers. -Angie

data.text: Fingerprint scanner doesn't work, I had to change my password multiple times because the scanner didn't work. Can't use the same password as before, but it doesn't tell you that until after you type it in. I had to use a weaker password because of that rule just so that I can remember it. It tells you to go to the app's settings to fix the fingerprint scanner, but there is no settings option in the menu. Very frustrating.

The new update is not as user friendly. You used to be able to go directly to specific transactions, deposits, withdrawals, etc. by clicking on them from your account page. Now you have to go into your account and search for transactions instead. On certain transactions you must know specific information to search or you may not find the item you are looking for. Also, while scrolling through the transactions, the screen glitches and jumps back even though you already passed that section.
data.replyText: We'd like to help. To determine what may be occurring, please contact technical support at 1-800-956-4442, so they can look into this. -Loni

data.text: I do not like the new update at all! It's a lot more difficult to navigate. I now have to click on every transaction listed to actually see what it is since it just says "purchase authorized...". Also, it seems to keep scrolling back to the Wells Fargo deals every time the screen changes. There should be an option to close the deals. I do not find it easier or better at all!
data.replyText: Hi, we constantly strive to provide our customers with a great experience. We will consider your feedback seriously in planning future improvements. If you need any further assistance or have additional feedback, please contact us at 1-800-956-4442. -Helen

data.text: The new app version is almost unusable. Trying to scroll through transactions is a painstaking endeavor and you better not click on a transaction. If you do once you back out you're back at the top of the list. Then you've got to start the painful scrolling all over again. The UI is now so messed up and terrible to use that it's almost impossible to find anything anymore, besides. The old app version worked wonderfully. If it ain't broke, don't fix it.

data.text: The previous design worked so much better than this new one. Too many clicks to get the full transaction history, and the filter option doesn't work. Once I'm on the transaction history I can't even scroll thru it! It keeps jumping back up to the top. It's truly unusable. Another bizarre thing happens after I've opened the WF app and then switched to another app, about 5 minutes later the Wells Fargo app pops back up in front of the other app, interrupting whatever I'm doing. So aggravating.

data.text: App gets the job done. However, I've had an annoying issue for a while. If you change your phone's minimum width (dpi) in your phone's developer settings, the app goes from having a normal app-like UI to literally just displaying the website (as if you were on computer). For this reason, I've been unable to use fingerprint sign on for about 3 years, and the UI isn't good since it's displaying a website on a phone screen. I really hope someone sees this and fixes it.
data.replyText: We're sorry to hear that and would like to try to help. Please email us with details (phone number, link to this public comment and your reviewer name) at appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com. Do not share anything private when emailing us, such as account numbers. -Karla

data.text: Total garbage. Used to work just fine, now I cant transfer money, pay bills etc because it just glitches out and locks up. I was contacted by the support team. Had to uninstall and reinstall the app. It is working fine for now. Changed to 3 stars from 1 since it is fixed but it was working fine before they upgraded it. To note, I did update the app prior to doing anything after the "upgrade" and still had no luck.
data.replyText: Apologies for the inconvenience. We're working on fixing the issue. Try to go to the app management section of your device and then Clear Data and Cache if the option is available. In the meantime, please use your mobile or desktop browser to make transactions. Call 1-800-956-4442 for more help. -Helen

data.text: Created by amateurs. It's 2021 and they haven't figured out how to work with password managers properly. 1. When I use LastPass to log in, the username and password are entered in the correct fields, but the app lacks the logic to check the inputs that are filled it. To log in, I have to add a character to the end of the username and password and then delete them. This signals the app that data has been entered. This is literally the only app that fails like this and I have several financial
data.replyText: We're sorry to hear that and would like to try and help. Please email us with details (phone number, link to this public comment and your reviewer name) at appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com. Do not share anything private when emailing us, such as account numbers. -Richard
